00036 #ifndef _PSEUDOECGALCALCULATOR_HPP_
00037 #define _PSEUDOECGALCALCULATOR_HPP_
00038 
00039 #include "AbstractFunctionalCalculator.hpp"
00040 #include "AbstractTetrahedralMesh.hpp"
00041 #include "ChastePoint.hpp"
00042 #include "UblasCustomFunctions.hpp"
00043 #include "Hdf5DataReader.hpp"
00044 
00059 /*
00060  * NB I don't think that this class needs to be templated over PROBLEM_DIM,
00061  *  since even when working with Bidomain we only integrate one thing at once,
00062  *  and hence still need to call AbstractFunctionalCalculator<ELEMENT_DIM, SPACE_DIM, 1>.
00063  *  See PostProcessingWriter.cpp line ~141. The fact that it is only explicitly
00064  *  instantiated (at the bottom of the cpp) for cases with 1, would agree with this.
00065  *
00066  *  But at the same time it probably isn't worth breaking users' code by changing it.
00067  *  Might also make it easier to copy and paste for any new class that does a
00068  *  fancier integral with more quantities.
00069  */
00070 template<unsigned ELEMENT_DIM, unsigned SPACE_DIM, unsigned PROBLEM_DIM>
00071 class PseudoEcgCalculator : public AbstractFunctionalCalculator<ELEMENT_DIM, SPACE_DIM, PROBLEM_DIM>
00072 {
00073 private:
00074 
00075     friend class TestPseudoEcgCalculator;//for testing
00076 
00077     Hdf5DataReader* mpDataReader; 
00078     unsigned mNumberOfNodes; 
00079     unsigned mNumTimeSteps;
00080     AbstractTetrahedralMesh<ELEMENT_DIM,SPACE_DIM>& mrMesh;
00081     ChastePoint<SPACE_DIM> mProbeElectrode; 
00082     double mDiffusionCoefficient;
00083     std::string mVariableName;
00084     unsigned mTimestepStride; 
00095     double GetIntegrand(ChastePoint<SPACE_DIM>& rX,
00096                         c_vector<double,PROBLEM_DIM>& rU,
00097                         c_matrix<double,PROBLEM_DIM,SPACE_DIM>& rGradU);
00098 
00099 
00107     double ComputePseudoEcgAtOneTimeStep(unsigned timeStep);
00108 
00118     bool ShouldSkipThisElement(Element<ELEMENT_DIM,SPACE_DIM>& rElement);
00119 
00120 public:
00121 
00134     PseudoEcgCalculator(AbstractTetrahedralMesh<ELEMENT_DIM,SPACE_DIM>& rMesh,
00135                         const ChastePoint<SPACE_DIM>& rProbeElectrode,
00136                         const FileFinder& rDirectory,
00137                         std::string hdf5File,
00138                         std::string variableName = "V",
00139                         unsigned timestepStride = 1);
00140 
00144     ~PseudoEcgCalculator();
00145 
00146 
00153     void SetDiffusionCoefficient(double diffusionCoefficient);
00154 
00164     void WritePseudoEcg();
00165 
00166 };
00167 
00168 #endif //_PSEUDOECGALCALCULATOR_HPP_
